item.title: How vulnerable is our water supply to climate change?
item.description: Vulnerability Assessment of Drinking Water Supply under Climate Uncertainty using a RANK Model The contamination in the river can enter the water supply system and pollute the drinking water. In this study, a framework was developed to demonstrate the application of a computational fluid dynamics model in risk assessment of contamination exposure in surface waters. This model aims to address the limitations of current water quality models by establishing a two-dimensional finite volume-based model.
